articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Multiple-Rocket Launching Drill
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Multiple-Rocket Launching Drill
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the multiple-rocket launching drill of women's sub-units under KPA Unit 851.
					 He received a report about the firing plan and deployment of sub-units.
					
					 "As I always emphasize, it is necessary to root out formalism in training and thoroughly do away with a diagrammatic method and stylish practice," he said, calling on the artillery persons, in particular, to make it as a rule to conduct all exercises ranging from mobility to deployment, aiming and firing under the simulated conditions of an actual war to suit their combat duty.
					
					 After seeing the sub-units already deployed in the firing range, he gave an order to suddenly move from their positions.
					
					  The women soldiers of the sub-units promptly moved the heavy launchers and deployed them in the firing positions designated by the supreme commander by fully displaying the combat capability they have cultivated in their day-to-day training. 
					
					 When the order was issued, the sub-units started firing in the order and way indicated by him.
					
					 Watching the targets enveloped in flames, he said with great satisfaction: "They are good at firing. All the targets have been hit. Artillery women are admirable".
					
					 He highly appreciated the successful drill, saying that the artillery women of the unit could hit the targets under such situation as they have undergone intensive training in hearty response to the call of the Party for waging a dynamic movement to become crackshots.
					
					 He had a photo taken with them.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled to round off the preparations for artillery battles.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of KPA Founding
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of KPA Founding
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday to celebrate the 82nd anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Jang Jong Nam and other senior officials of party, state  and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces organs, the Cabinet, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions, factories and enterprises, heroes, those who had the honor of being received by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, families of service personnel, those of merits in aiding the army and working people in Pyongyang, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans staying in the socialist homeland.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and members of the military attaches corps here and foreign guests.
					
					 KPA Army General Ri Yong Gil, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chief of the KPA General Staff, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The KPA is a genuine army of the leader and the party as it has grown stronger over the past several decades under the cares of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, the first revolutionary armed forces of Juche type, on April 25, Juche 21 (1932).
					
					 This made it possible for the Korean people to have their genuine revolutionary army guided by the Juche idea and led by the peerless Songun commander for the first time in history and marked the beginning of the glorious history of the Korean revolution which has advanced and won victories by dint of arms.
					
					 It was the great patriotic exploits performed by Kim Il Sung that he provided the Korean people with a powerful treasured sword for carving out their independent destiny, defeated the most ferocious two imperialisms in one generation, founded a modern defence industry and put all people under arms and turned the whole country into a fortress, thereby converting the country into an invulnerable country capable of defending itself.
					
					 The history of the KPA is the one of Kim Il Sung's army-building and, at the same time, the one of Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made sure that the revolutionary soldier spirit was created by the KPA in the most arduous period of the Korean revolution and enforced the Songun politics in all spheres with the KPA as a main force, thus leading the struggle for defending socialism to a victory after another and paving a wide avenue for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The KPA greeted a glorious era by having as its supreme commander Kim Jong Un, another commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Kim Jong Un set forth the modeling of the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the general task for army-building and made a scientific clarification of all issues arising in the efforts to implement it, providing an immortal guiding principle for bolstering up the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					  Kim Jong Un was reelected first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at the First Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK. This was an event to be specially recorded in the national history as it provided a sure guarantee for the victory of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The reporter recalled that the KPA has performed proud feats unprecedented in the world history of army-building, remaining loyal to the cause of the party and leaders over the past 80 odd years.
					
					 The situation remains so tense on the Korean peninsula that a nuclear war may break out any time due to the frantic anti-DPRK rackets of the U.S. imperialists and its puppet forces, he noted.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and its allied forces intrude into the inviolable territory, air and seas of the DPRK even 0.001mm, its army and people will mercilessly wipe out the aggressors with weaponry of the revolution and the working class and achieve the historic cause of national reunification, he declared.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits at S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits at S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) --  The south Korean ruling forces are mulling setting up in south Korea the UN "Office for Human Rights in North" tasked to conduct an anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					 Park Geun Hye claimed that the settlement of "the north's human rights issue" should be topped in laying "foundations for the era of unification".
					
					 Coteries of the ruling "Saenuri Party" in south Korea made public a "joint statement" in demand of the establishment of the UN "Office for Human Rights in North". Meanwhile, 17 conservative and reactionary organizations including the "Citizens' Solidarity for Human Rights in North" and wicked conservative media are also calling for setting up the "office".
					
					 It is an awful act contrary to the common sense for those living in tundra of human rights to talk about the "human rights issue". And it is no more than a political cartoon for them to call for setting up the "office".
					
					 Some days ago, the puppet south Korean regime co-sponsored a "resolution on human rights in north Korea" at the UN Human Rights Council to slander the fellow countrymen. Its reckless scheme to set up the "office" in south Korea shows that they made it an established fact to bring the north-south relations to a total bankruptcy. 
					
					 Thanks to the sincere effort made by the DPRK for the improved bilateral relations, an atmosphere of reconciliation had prevailed on the Korean Peninsula until some time ago. But, the situation on the peninsula is getting tense again, entirely due to the confrontation policy of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The south Korean forces have created a touch-and-go situation on the peninsula by staging Foal Eagle and Max Thunder joint military exercises.  And they were hell-bent on the moves for confrontation with the fellow countrymen in breach of the agreement adopted by the north and the south to stop slandering each other.
					
					 After all, the scheme for setting up UN "Office for Human Rights in North" clearly shows that the south Korean authorities' attempt to isolate and stifle the DPRK, in league with outsiders, has reached extremely dangerous stage. 
					
					 What they seek in setting up the "office" is to make the DPRK's "human rights issue" a topic for world public discussion and then incite the bitterness toward the DPRK and further strengthen the cooperation for anti-DPRK "human rights" smear campaign with foreign forces.
					
					 The present south Korean regime's scheme for such illegal plotting body is an extremely reckless and hostile act against the fellow countrymen, which surpasses the preceding regime's anti-DPRK deeds. The preceding regime, keen on the anti-DPRK human rights campaign at the instigation of the U.S., dared not attempt to set up such office in south Korea. 
					
					 Its hysteric attempt to stage, through the "office", actions of slandering the dignity and social system of the DPRK in coordination with foreign forces hostile toward it, is now being censured by all the fellow countrymen as a thrice-cursed confrontational farce pursuant to the U.S. human rights offensive against the DPRK. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not act rashly, mindful that such human rights smear campaign by the hostile forces can never work on the DPRK.
					
					 They are advised to quit the imprudent "human rights" campaign aimed to do harm to the sovereignty and social system of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands "Dresden Declaration" as Anti-reunification Declaration
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands "Dresden Declaration" as Anti-reunification Declaration
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- "Dresden Declaration" raised by south Korean chief executive Park Geun Hye is a confrontational declaration flouting the nation's desire for reunification, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 The declaration is a traitorous one bereft of the patriotic spirit and stand and an anti-reunification declaration that deteriorates the north-south relations and escalates distrust and confrontation between the fellow countrymen, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The declaration called for "settling humanitarian issues", "laying groundwork for improving the livelihood of the people for common prosperity" and "recovering homogeneity" as its main content.
					
					 National independence is an immutable principle that can never be compromised in settling the reunification issue.
					
					 The June 15 reunification era showed that it is possible to improve the north-south relations and open up a wide avenue for peace and reunification only when all the Koreans reject outsiders and pool their efforts.
					
					 To cry out for "humanitarian issues", "common prosperity" and "recovery of homogeneity", away from the principle of independence and the stand of By Our Nation Itself, is just a deception to win popularity under the spurious signboard of "unification".
					
					 Are the north-south relations not improving because there are no "reunions" or "nutritional aid"?
					
					 What the puppet forces seek is to undermine the ideology in the DPRK and bring down its social system under the signboard of "common prosperity" and "exchanges".
					
					 The south Korean authorities' foolish act of abusing man's noble kindred feelings for escalating confrontation and revealing their despicable wild ambition for "unification of systems" will only foment discord and distrust among fellow countrymen and escalate confrontation.
					
					 If they honestly want to offer new proposals, they should present ways for respecting and implementing north-south declarations in which the north and the south promised to settle the issue of the country's reunification by Our Nation Itself. Any acts contrary to this can never evade the curse and denunciation by the nation as an anti-reunification act.

articles.title: KPA Turns to Be Invincible Army
articles.content:
KPA Turns to Be Invincible Army
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Greeting the anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the DPRK people are recalling the feats performed by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in building up invincible armed forces
					 Basing himself on the principle that arms is decisive of the nation's destiny and the victory of revolution, Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army on April 25, Juche 21 (1932) to fight the Japanese invaders.
					
					 Since then, the Korean people have had their own army and a new history of the victorious Korean revolution started with armed struggle as the main.
					
					 In the whole period of his protracted revolutionary activities he had directed primary efforts to strengthening the revolutionary armed forces. Under his Songun (military-first) guidance, the Korean people defeated the Japanese and U.S. invaders in one generation and turned the whole country into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 The cause of building the Juche-based armed forces developed on a higher level under Kim Jong Il's Songun politics.
					
					 Kim Jong Il began his Songun leadership with an inspection tour of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA. Giving top priority to the military affairs, he energetically led the work to beef up the nation's military strength.
					
					 When the country was undergoing the grimmest trial, he pursued the Songun politics in an all-round way, thus turning the KPA into a powerful elite Paektusan revolutionary army and the DPRK into a military power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The DPRK's armed forces have greeted a heyday of their development under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has paid big efforts to building the KPA into the ranks of genuine comrades-in-arms sharing the same destiny with their supreme commander. He frequently finds himself among soldiers in frontline areas and does not hesitate to go even to the biggest hotspot to bring about the final victory in showdown with the U.S.
					
					 The KPA will win victory after victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the peerlessly illustrious commander.

articles.title: Protocol on DPRK-Russia Trade and Economic Cooperation Signed
articles.content:
Protocol on DPRK-Russia Trade and Economic Cooperation Signed
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- The protocol of the 7th meeting of joint working groups for trade and economic cooperation was signed here on Thursday between the Committee for the Promotion of International Trade of the DPRK and the Sakhalin Regional Government of the Russian Federation. 
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of the Committee for the Promotion of International Trade and from the opposite side members of the delegation of the Sakhalin Regional Government of Russia.

articles.title: Foreign Railway Delegations Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Railway Delegations Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Delegations of Belarus, Ukraine, Estonia and Vietnam arrived here by air and train on Thursday to take part in the 29th meeting of general directors of the Organization of Railways Cooperation.
					 Earlier arrivals here were delegations of various countries including Russia, China, Latvia, Hungary, Mongolia, Azerbaijan and Kazakhstan.

articles.title: IWF Chairperson Here
articles.content:
IWF Chairperson Here
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Tamas Ajan, chairperson of the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF), arrived here by air on Thursday.

British Senator Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Neil Forbes Davidson, senator from the British Labor Party, and his companion flew back for home on Thursday.

DWUK Delegation Leaves for Russia, Belarus

articles.title: Foreigners Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Participants in the 29th meeting of general directors of the Organization of Railways Cooperation laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday and paid tribute to them. 
					 A delegation of the Sakhalin Regional Government of Russia led by Gakh Elena Nikolayevna, deputy minister of Economic Development, paid tribute to the statues on the same day.

articles.title: Significant Gathering Recorded in History of Struggle for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Significant Gathering Recorded in History of Struggle for Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Sixty-six years has passed since the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Social Organizations in North and South Korea took place here on the initiative of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Korea, liberated from Japan's colonial rule, was under the complicated situation at that time. The U.S. imperialists occupied the south of it and made a "decision" on enforcing separate elections there, bringing the country to a crisis of national division.
					
					 In October Juche 36 (1947), Kim Il Sung set forth a policy on convening the joint conference of representatives of political parties and social organizations from the north and the south of Korea. And he convened a meeting on March 9 in 1948 in order to prevent the elections for establishing a reactionary "separate government" in the south and achieve Korea's reunification and complete independence.
					
					 At the meeting, he clarified again the stand for establishing a unified democratic people's government and advanced a strategic policy for rallying closer all the patriotic and democratic forces in the struggle for freedom and independence of the country.
					
					 Then, the President energetically led the work to ensure the successful joint conference. He saw to it that brisk activities were conducted to inform all the Koreans in the north and the south of the purpose and significance of the joint conference as well as of the U.S. imperialists' policy of national division, in face of the vicious obstruction by the U.S. imperialists and their stooges.
					
					 After all, a large number of personages came to Pyongyang for the joint conference, attracted by his broad magnanimity, ardent patriotism and leadership ability.
					
					 The joint conference calling for the building of a unified independent and sovereign state by great national unity took place in Pyongyang on April 19-23, 1948. All its participants approved a proposal for standing against a "separate government" in south Korea and establishing an all-Korea unified government.
					
					 The conference served as a significant occasion in providing the precious tradition of rallying the patriotic forces of different social strata under the banner of anti-U.S. national salvation.

articles.title: Federation of Koreans in U.S. Accuses Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Federation of Koreans in U.S. Accuses Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. issued a commentary on April 19 disclosing the confrontational nature of the drone case faked up by the south Korean puppet forces.
					 The commentary censured Park Geun Hye for trying to use the drone case for the confrontation with fellowmen as they did as regards the Cheonan warship sinking case.
					
					 The same can be said of the fact that she took confrontational steps after the case and escalated military tensions through purchase of war hardware and armed buildup under the pretext of coping with the "north's attack", the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 The Park regime is pursuing plot-breeding politics to calm down the resentment of the people at the deterioration of the people's livelihood. It is terming the case "the north's act" for no reason and cooking up tailored evidence. This is nothing but a shameless political ploy.
					
					 The drone case is a repetition of the Cheonan warship sinking case.
					
					 After cooking up the drone case, Park is dreaming to secure the justification of the validity of "Dresden declaration" and win a victory in the June local elections but her dream will never be realized.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is the plot-breeding one. It is bedeviling the relations with the north and trying to wage a war against it. It is also an incompetent and vulgar regime making the people shed bitter tears. Such regime is trying not to step down of its own accord.
					
					 The commentary called upon all people to rise up in the drive to judge the Park Geun Hye regime and force it to step down.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Meet in Osaka Prefecture of Japan
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Meet in Osaka Prefecture of Japan
 Tokyo, April 22 (KNS-KCNA) -- A rally of the officials and activists of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was held in Osaka City on April 18. They are waging a general advance for the 70-day movement to make the 23rd Congress of Chongryon a foundation for making a leap forward in the efforts to usher in a new heyday in the glorious Kim Jong Un's era.
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and Vice-Chairman Pae Ik Ju of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the headquarters, and other officials and activists and chairpersons of 9 local headquarters in Kanto, Tokai, Kinki and Chushigoku.
					
					 Pu Yong Uk in his report referred to the successes achieved in the "Osaka one-mind movement for taking the lead in the 70-day movement" and called for playing the leading role in the whole organization's last drive of the movement with doubled efforts.
					
					 Speakers expressed their resolutions to register signal successes in their units' work and thus greet the 23rd Congress of Chongryon with proud achievements.
					
					 An appeal to officials and activists of the Chongryon organizations at all levels was read out at the meeting.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in a speech expressed belief that all the officials and activists of Chongryon in Osaka would surely develop the Osaka movement into a new heyday as required by the era.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un Carried by Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Enhancing the Role of the Popular Masses Is the Guarantee for Victory in the Cause of Independence", leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Glorify the Great Achievements of the Respected Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" and Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great  Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" were carried by the Russian paper Patriot No. 14.
					 Kim Il Sung's work, made public on April 15, Juche 81 (1992), clarifies that the Workers' Party of Korea has firmly maintained the Juche-oriented stand and principle, always guided by the Juche idea, in the whole course of the revolution and construction.
					
					 It also indicates that the common task facing the Korean people and the world people is to build an independent new world.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's work, published on April 17, 1992, deals with the greatness of Kim Il Sung and indicates the tasks to hold him in high esteem for all ages.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's work, made public on April 20, 2012, clarifies the revolutionary exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in their lifetimes. It indicates the tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits. 
					
					 The paper carried photos of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- A foreign magazine and papers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 The April issue of International Link, a magazine of Hong Kong, China, carried articles illustrated with photos of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 In an article titled "Eternal sun of Juche" it said that progressive humankind of the world praise Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 Dealing with his exploits, it said the brilliant victories and successes achieved by him through his Songun revolutionary leadership greatly inspired progressive humankind in its struggle for independence.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of all peoples as he opened up the era of independence and dedicated his whole life to accomplishing the cause of global independence, the article noted.
					
					 An article titled "Personality of popular leader" said that Kim Jong Un is making a new history of love for the people, adding that the people are leading a happy life thanks to him, a reality of the DPRK.
					
					 Xing San Daily of Thailand on April 11 devoted its one whole page to an article titled "Eternal sun" with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The April issue of the Bulgarian paper Iskra carried an article introducing his revolutionary career. The article was illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Lauded by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Lauded by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Personages of various countries made public statements on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana said on April 14:
					
					 Kim Il Sung saved the Korean people from the destiny of the colonial slave and put forward them as the most dignified people in the world.
					
					 He provided the solid self-supporting national economy and powerful national defence capability so that the Korean people might dynamically advance along the road chosen by them.
					
					 He clearly indicated the road to be followed by not only the Korean people but the world progressives and made tangible contributions to the independent development of African countries, in particular.
					
					 Saber Ballul, head of a department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus, Syria, said on April 13:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the benevolent father who dedicated his all to the country and people till the last moments of his life and invincible and iron-willed brilliant commander and outstanding strategist who defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation.
					
					 He was the tender-hearted father of the Korean people and the great sun revered by all peoples as he turned the DPRK into a genuine people's country, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 Guy Dupre, vice-president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, said on April 7:
					
					 The world progressives are significantly celebrating the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung together with the Korean people. We pay highest tribute to him.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries 
 Pyongyang, April 24 (KCNA) -- Colorful events took place in foreign countries to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun). 
					 A meeting was held in Havana, Cuba and lectures, photo exhibitions and film shows in India and El Djazair, Algeria on April 14 and 15. 
					
					 On display at the venues of the photo exhibitions were photos documenting exploits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and other photos showing the might of Songun Korea. 
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "The Arch of Triumph".
					
					 The first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung was the peerlessly great man. 
					
					 He was the veteran and tested elder statesman who defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialism and built a powerful socialist country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence. 
					
					 He was a close friend of Cuba as he rendered material aid and moral assistance to the Cuban people when they suffered ordeals. 
					
					 We will make every effort for Korea's reunification, the desire and behest of Comrade Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The principal of an Indian school in a lecture titled "Father of the people" said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, is deeply revered by the people as the benevolent father. 
					
					 He regarded it as his great duty and pleasure to serve the people. 
					
					 That is why the Korean people are holding him in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 He is alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also progressive mankind.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de fuego de artilleras de lanzacohetes
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de fuego de artilleras de lanzacohetes
 Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el entrenamiento de fuego de la subunidad de las artilleras de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados, adscrita a la unidad 851 del EPC.
					 Al informarse del plan de tiro y el estado de disposicion de las subunidades, el Mariscal dijo que como el mismo mencionaba a menudo, hay que eliminar a fondo el formalismo y el esquematismo en el entrenamiento. Agrego que sobre todo, los artilleros de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados deben acostumbrarse a realizar todos los procesos del entrenamiento desde el movimiento y el despliegue hasta la punteria del blanco y el tiro, en un ambiente del combate real conforme a su mision.
					
					 El Comandante Supremo dio la orden de mover de repente a una nueva posicion a las companias de artilleria, desplegadas ya en la posicion del campo de tiro.
					
					 Manifestando la elevada capacidad combativa adiestrada ordinariamente, las artilleras movieron rapidamente arrastrando los canones pesados y terminaron la preparacion de tiro en la nueva posicion de fuego, definida por el Comandante Supremo.
					
					 Bajo la orden, las subunidades de lanzacohetes abrieron el fuego segun el turno y el metodo de tiro fijados por el Mariscal.
					
					 Al ver los blancos sumergiendo en el mar de fuego, el Mariscal expreso gran satisfaccion diciendo que las artilleras disparaban bien, dieron exactamente en los blancos y agrego que ellas eran muy loables.
					
					 Las artilleras de la unidad, conscientes de la demanda del Partido de desarrollar dinamicamente el movimiento de artilleros certeros, realizaron los ejercicios en el alto nivel, asi que pudieron dar en el blanco, aun en la condicion inesperada como hoy, destaco y aprecio mucho a ellas que cumplieron con exito el entrenamiento de tiro.
					
					 Tras fotografiarse junto con las artilleras, el Mariscal presento las tareas programaticas para completar mas los preparativos del combate de la artilleria.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central por 82o aniversario de fundacion de EPC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central por 82o aniversario de fundacion de EPC 
 Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este jueves en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 82o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					 Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Jang Jong Nam y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, consejo de ministros, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de los organismos, fabricas y empresas de esta capital, los heroes, las personas que fueron recibidas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los familiares de militares, los ameritados en la ayuda al ejercito, los trabajadores, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y los compatriotas residentes en ultramar. 
					
					 Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC. 
					
					 El dijo que el EPC es el verdadero ejercito del lider y el partido, desarrollado siglo tras siglo bajo la atencion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, y continuo:
					
					 El Presidente fundo el 25 de abril del 21 (1932) de la Era Juche el Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea, primeras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de tipo jucheano.
					
					 De esa manera, el pueblo coreano pudo tener por primera vez en la historia el ejercito revolucionario guiado por la idea Juche y comandado por el general insigne del Songun. Desde entonces, comenzo la gloriosa historia de la revolucion coreana que sale victoriosa con el poderio de las fuerzas armadas. 
					
					 El Presidente dio al pueblo coreano la poderosa arma para la forja del destino independiente, vencio en una generacion a los dos imperialismos mas barbaros, fundo la moderna industria de defensa nacional y logro el armamento de todo el pueblo y la fortificacion de todo el pais, de modo de que la patria se convirtiera en el pais autodefensivo e inexpugnable. Esto es la gran proeza patriotica del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 La historia del EPC es el trayecto de construccion del ejercito del Presidente y al mismo tiempo, el de direccion del Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 En el periodo mas severo de la revolucion coreana, el hizo crear en el EPC el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y establecio globalmente la politica de Songun tomando como grueso al EPC. De esta manera, condujo a la victoria sucesiva la lucha por la defensa del socialismo y abrio la ruta de construccion de un Estado prospero. 
					
					 El EPC acogio la era gloriosa por haber tenido en el puesto supremo al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, otro General del monte Paektu. 
					
					 El Mariscal presento la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo como meta general de construccion del ejercito y dio respuestas cientificas a todos los problemas para el respecto y preparo la inmortal guia directriz para el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias. 
					
					 En el primer periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, el fue reelecto como Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Esto es un jubilo nacional que garantiza la victoria de la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					 Durante mas de 80 anos, el EPC vino registrando relevantes meritos no vistos en la historia mundial de construccion militar apoyando con fidelidad la causa del partido, la del lider. 
					
					 Hoy dia, la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra en la situacion muy tirante que puede convertirse en guerra nuclear en cualquier momento, debido a la campana anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					 Si los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus satelites invaden, aunque sea 0.001mm, el sagrado territorio, cielo y mar de la patria, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos aniquilaran despiadadamente con las armas de la revolucion y clase a los invasores y cumpliran la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: ACNC rechaza instalacion de "oficina de DDHH del Norte" en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC rechaza instalacion de "oficina de DDHH del Norte" en el Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos pretenden instalar la "oficina de DDHH del Norte" de la ONU, aparato de conspiracion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					 La mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye insistio en resolver con prioridad el "problema de DDHH" de alguien para consolidar la "base de la era de unificacion". En tanto, los compinches del "Partido Saenuri" publicaron una "declaracion conjunta" y 17 entidades reaccionarias y medios conservadores tambien urgen la instalacion de la oficina en cuestion. 
					
					 Es otra caricatura politica el hecho de que el infierno de DDHH cuestione la situacion de "DDHH" de alguien y solicite la instalacion del "centro de debate de DDHH". 
					
					 Hace poco, en el Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, los titeres surcoreanos acusaron a la parte connacional incorporandose a la fabricacion del "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH del Norte" y ahora intentan instalar en el suelo surcoreano la "oficina de DDHH del Norte" de la ONU. Este proceder toma por hecho consumado la ruptura total de las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					 Hasta hace poco, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se dirigia a la reconciliacion gracias a los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC por mejorar los vinculos Norte-Sur. Pero, vuelve ahora a la fase catastrofica debido a la politica conflictiva antinacional de las autoridades surcoreanas. 
					
					 Recientemente, los titeres surcoreanos crearon la tension critica en la Peninsula Coreana librando los ejercicios belicos conjuntos Foal Eagle y Max Thunder, y al mismo tiempo, lanzaron la campana de confrontacion fratricida violando el acuerdo Norte-Sur sobre el cese de calumnias a la contraparte. 
					
					 Pues, la instalacion de la "oficina de DDHH del Norte" de la ONU en tales circunstancias demuestra que llega al climax la ambicion de los titeres surcoreanos de aislar y aplastar a la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					 La verdadera intencion de ellos es infundir la conciencia hostil contra la RPDC en la sociedad internacional mediante el "problema de DDHH del Norte" y consolidar mas la cooperacion intrigante de "DDHH" anti-RPDC con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					 La instalacion de la "oficina de DDHH del Norte" de la ONU en suelo surcoreano es un acto hostil a la parte connacional al que no se atrevieron ni los "poderes" antecesores.
					
					 Provoca gran denuncia de la nacion el proceder histerico de la banda titere surcoreana, que pretende instalar en el suelo surcoreano la base de las fuerzas hostiles anti-RPDC y utilizarla para calumniar la dignidad y el regimen de la parte connacional en confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					 Los titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia. 
					
					 Hace falta recordar otra vez que la campana intrigante de "DDHH" de las fuerzas hostiles no saldra nunca con la suya en el caso de la RPDC. 
					
					 Las autoridades surcoreanas deben parar de inmediato la farsa de "DDHH" que es un atentado contra la sagrada soberania y el regimen de la RPDC.

articles.title: Rubricado protocolo de reunion de grupo conjunto de trabajo de cooperacion Corea-Rusia
articles.content:
Rubricado protocolo de reunion de grupo conjunto de trabajo de cooperacion Corea-Rusia
 Pyongyang, 24 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 24 en esta capital el protocolo de la 7a reunion del grupo conjunto de trabajo de la cooperacion economica y comercial entre el Comite de Promocion de Comercio Internacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el gobierno regional de Sajalin de la Federacion Rusa.
					 En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes los miembros del comite referido por la parte coreana, y por la rusa, los miembros de la delegacion del gobierno regional de Sajalin.
